website_summaries.verdict: Optical diffusers help erase your dark circles immediately, while blueberry extract and other ingredients reduce puffiness and fight signs of aging over time.
pros: Uses optical diffusers to brighten the skin around your eyes
Blueberry extract helps to moisturize the skin, increase its elasticity and reduce future signs of aging
Firms and tightens skin, as well as diminishing look of wrinkles
cons: Irritation of the skin around the eye is possible

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the bags and shoo the crows.......
customer_reviews.text: I loved, loved, loved this product. I am religious about eye creams and always look for ones that help reduce the signs of aging...this one kept my under/beside my eye area soft, seemed to reduce the puffiness/bags and reduced the laugh lines at the corner of my eyes. Although it was a little pricey, I will buy this again and again
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Odd
customer_reviews.text: This was quite different than what I purchased at my local physicians office. I thought that I would use a gift card to purchase more but sent it back, quality was not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a year now. When I ran out recently I definitely noticed a difference. My eyes got darker and could see fine lines more. Ordered more and it’s working again! Love it. I’m 50 by the way and have heredity dark eye circles.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I used This everyday for 6 months and noticed nothing different about my eye puffiness or dark circles. It is a nice moisturizer but NOT worth the price whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gippi

customer_reviews.title: best eye cream on the market
customer_reviews.text: best eye cream on the market! my derm recommended this - and my lines are a little smaller, my skin more smooth and soft. worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: donnatryba

customer_reviews.title: Best eye cream ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye cream ever. I have tried several high end brands and AGE beats them all hands down. Over about 3-4 weeks you can see firming and tightening of the upper lid. Smooths fine lines nicely. Have used this product for 3 years
customer_reviews.author: devora

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness. I finally found an eye cream that works. My fine lines have diminished and lightened dark circles under my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, especially for eye circles and puffy eyes. I give it four stars because it is not VERY hydrating. Nevertheless, a very good product! It is obviously not cheap, but you only need a tiny bit.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Helps with undereye dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I really do think that this product helps to reduce the dark circles under my eyes. I've been using it for a couple of years, and I don't have the dark circles that I had prior to using it. In my opinion, it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Only cream that took care of my crows feet, I have tried everything out there. Will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the few eye creams I've used ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few eye creams I've used over many years that does not contribute to the 'melia' (sp?) - those little clogged white pores that get clogged around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tatie

customer_reviews.title: Best eye repair
customer_reviews.text: Best eye repair, wear every am, pm I am in my 50's and my skin is so soft and smooth, no pours and it looks like a baby's skin because of this line and sunblock everyday. If you want a eye product that is going to really make and repair lines, dark circles, make your eyes look beautiful and healthy, spend the money this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R Goldfarb

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: don't see any results after almost finishing the entire bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Clean eating girl

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years and receive many compliments on my skin. Whenever I try to switch over to something less pricey, I notice the difference immediately. Proved the old saying, you get what you is for. My dermatologist told me to keep doing whatever I was doing, so I’ll switch no more.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE G.

customer_reviews.title: Saw no improvement
customer_reviews.text: Used it faithfully for 2 months, and saw no difference. Disappointing at that cost to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Kay M. Maddox

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: After using most of the product I am now seeing less puffiness and dark areas under my eyes. Stick with the product and you will see some nice results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I love this eye cream and try not to run out ...
customer_reviews.text: Just posted this but I'll do so again. I love this eye cream and try not to run out of it as I do see a difference when I have had to switch to another eye cream. I have no wrinkles around my eyes and at 69 I think what you use plays a major part. I highly recommend this eye cream.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia R Reid

customer_reviews.title: ... product for over 4 months and I was so happy. I don't have that much wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for over 4 months and I was so happy. I don't have that much wrinkle, so I can't tell wrinkles are gonna go away but it feels good when you wear it at night and it at least prevents the wrinkle
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the product now for about 2 weeks and started to see some positive results on my dark circles. So far I am happy with this product and hope that I will see even better results as continue to use it.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed

customer_reviews.text: This eye cream is exceptional. I use it with the Opal Clarisonic and it keeps the skin under my eyes looking great! I am allergic to lots of products, but not this one!! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes your skin feel so soft and smooth - not heavy on the face. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Controls swelling
customer_reviews.text: This batch wasn't as thick as the other jars I have purchased. I like how this cream keeps my bags from swelling!

customer_reviews.title: It's a very heavy cream, so you only need ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very heavy cream, so you only need a small amount. It is also kinda pasty, so I have to really rub it in or it feels heavy on my eyes. It's just okay, but I probably will try to find another product.
customer_reviews.author: CAMom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Though this is sort of pricey for me, I'll keep using it. I had a small amount of scar tissue on my eyelid and repeated use of this product removed it. I also get some kind of funky bumps on my eyelids that I have had removed by a dermatologist in the past, but this product removed those in time as well. The product never stings and is well absorbed, not feeling sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sims

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: I have such sensitive skin around my eyes and it stays irritated and dry but this product has really changed that. I use it morning and night and it keeps my skin well hydrated and helps reduce the appearance of my eye bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I like the consistency of the Eye Balm better
customer_reviews.text: its ok - kind of too thick to go on very smoothly over very tender eye area!! I like the consistency of the Eye Balm better. Not sure how much difference I notice as far as puffiness etc...but about as much as any other eye creams I have tried I guess!!
customer_reviews.author: skibumB4

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This eye cream gave me a rash around my eye. I would not suggest purchasing this product!!!

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly effective
customer_reviews.text: Not particularly effective. Feels nice and great texture. Great at moisturizing without leaving skin shiny but ultimately no visible benefits.

customer_reviews.title: My eyes reactecd poorly to this cream

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: The best eye cream I've ever used. I've used others (cheaper and more expensive) this lil' cream is fantastic. No dark circles, no crepiness, no puffy eyes. Little bit goes a long way.

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice going on

customer_reviews.title: This eye cream does live up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: So this was recommended to me by a friend who just turned 50 and looks 40. I'm 43 and doing what a lot of women do; battlng the aging process. This is my second jar of this eye cream. I use it at night and morning and it's just wonderful. goes on very light and I feel it's made a noticable difference in the laugh lines around my eyes. I also think it's helping w/ those bags we get too. It's expensive, but this jar lasts me about 6 months, sometimes longer. The key is daily use! So I was NOT given this product to review. (I never trust those reviews btw.)

Well, I used it daily for more than a month and saw NO improvement whatsoever. I also didn't like this product because it did not absorb quickly. It would remain glossy for quite some time after application. I don't think it's a bad eye cream, it's just not worth the price and it doesn't meet its own claims.

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it, i wont know if i love it for a little while. When i first got it i thought the container was soo small and that it would barely last but the product is very thick, which i love. doesn't leave a greasy residue. i think it sort of has diminished my dark circles but they definitely aren't completely gone (i dont think any product would be able to completely get rid of mine).
customer_reviews.author: Heather G

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is not a product that vanishes crows feet. No product can do that if it they say it does they are lying. It does hydrate in a way that minimizes and softens them. Most of all, it keeps me from having that crepe paper krinkly look below them. I once discontinued it for a while and the "crepeiness came back. I discovered real quick that this is a must have to make eyes look fresher, moist and supple around the delicate area above, beneath and all around.
customer_reviews.author: East TX Gal

customer_reviews.title: Deep Set Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have deep set eyes which can look very dark, this really helps them look brighter. Skin smooth and wrinkles not as noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Brown's On The Tennessee Ridge

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME eye cream. I am 62 and have been using this for 6yrs. My doctor is always telling me whatever you are using around your eyes, keep using it. You have very little crow lines
customer_reviews.author: Len McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Mom's fav
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying to get my mother on board with skincare I finally did it. I don't even know how many products that I gave her went unused and then for some mystical reason she actually used this! Not only did she like it, but she started receiving compliments on how well rested she looked and now she calls me to get her more before the jar runs out! I know this brand is a little pricey but to us it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: esidemachine

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended to me when having a facial
customer_reviews.text: I've used a ton of eye creams with claims of miracles......this one comes through. This product was recommended to me when having a facial. I think I bought the eye cream because I was on such a high from the fabulous facial that I just needed to take a piece of it home with me in hopes I wouldn't come down from my 'facial high'. I started to see me dark circles disappear after the 2 application. My dark circles were gone.....until my jar was empty. I went two months without A.G.E. until I received this shipment yesterday. I used it last night and this morning....it's already working!!! Worth the money to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the improvement in the creping around my
customer_reviews.text: 2nd purchase of this product. Very happy with the improvement in the creping around my eyes

customer_reviews.title: awesomeI
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be awesome... I have always had dark circles under my eyes even when I was young. Skinceuticals A.G.E. has really made a difference in the dark circles looking lighter and the fine lines have disappeared... I'm happy to have found this product! Well worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: It feels great on my skin but I am not sure if ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels great on my skin but I am not sure if I am seeing major results. It has only been 3 weeks though.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Not the real stuff. Seems to me that they try to pass this product off as the real thing, but clearly it isn't. Not even the right smell or consistency as the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Great preventive/early wrinkle product
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using this product at the recommendation of my dermatologist. Although the packaging says it's for "mature skin," it's great for those on the younger side considering a good early wrinkle protection measure. I'm 31 years old and I can already tell a difference in the smoothness around the outside corners of my eyes, where smile lines first appear. I love how this product feels, too - an intense tingling that feels like it's working. Don't be put off by the small size for the price point; a little goes a long way and I usually just pat a bit on my ring finger for application and it's more than enough to cover my whole eye area.
customer_reviews.author: RMIC

customer_reviews.title: a fan of A.g.e. eye complex

No issues with my concealer drying out under my eyes.

I think after a period of time it is good to switch skin products just like shampoos as long as they are quality products

product_meta.title: SkinCeuticals A.G.E. Eye Complex 0.5 oz Moisturizing Anti Aging Eye Cream with Vitamin E Helps Reduces Dark Circles, Puffiness and Crow’s Feet
product_meta.description: This incredible treatment offers both instant and lasting anti aging benefits to the eye area. Optical diffusers instantly reduce the appearance of dark circles and capillaries while flavanoids and peptides work over time to dramatically improve dark circles and puffiness. Blueberry extract and proxylane moisturize, nourish and prevent future visible signs of aging while simultaneously boosting elasticity and skin thickness, thereby diminishing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and crow's feet.
feature_bullets: ANTI-AGING MOISTURIZER offers instant and lasting benefits
REDUCE DARK CIRCLES instantly with hard working optical diffusers
IMPROVE DARK CIRCLES works over time to improve puffiness
STOP CROW'S FEET and prevent signs of aging while erasing wrinkles
